summary: The Expanded Spouse Choices series intends to add more marriage options, without console commands. This episode adds the Nord Thane of Solitude, Bryling, as a possible spouse and follower.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is very simple. Adds Bryling of Solitude to the Potential Marriage and Potential Follower factions. I also gave her armor and a new sword. She levels with the player, up to level 70. She\'s already essential in the vanilla game.

I removed most of her makeup, as all of the episodes in this series will do. Don\'t like it? Tough. I find the makeup in Skyrim to be very unattractive most of the time. 

I chose Bryling for the first one to mod because I liked her opinions on the Stormcloaks. She\'s one of the few with the Female Commander voice, I think Legate Rikke also has this voice (I\'ll mod her later). And she had this air of a warrior about her. 

If you like the mod, please endorse it. It\'s the best way to show thanks and appreciation to a modder (without donating money to them, or voting for them, never mind lol). 

Thanks for your time, have fun, and peace.

#Conflits

None that I know of. Obviously any mod that changes Bryling in any specific way will conflict with this mod. Please let me know if you have any issues.

#Compatible Mods
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9378]Multiple Marriages-Spouse Dress Up-Rehousing-And More Final[/url]


#Credits
-Bethesda for this awesome game.
-foretrenty for the great Skyrim NPC Editor which made this mod possible.
author: THEWULFMAN
